original: 以上是內政基本方針，大哥定能在天下爭霸過程中，體會到更好的辦法。如漢初張良、蕭何一樣，運籌帷幄之中，決勝千里之外。
text: The above is the basic policy of internal affairs, eldest brother will be able to experience better methods in the process of world hegemony. Like Zhang Liang and Xiao He in the early Han Dynasty, they were strategizing and winning thousands of miles away.
